data:
Facsimile Images

[ἐτ]ελεύτησε
[Ἀ]ρ̣έτη ἐν (Χριστο)ς
[π]ρὀ η´ ἰδῶν
Ἰουλίων

Apparatus criticus

Text of Orsi 1895

English translation

Arete passed away in Christ 8 days before the ides of July

commentary

The smaller lower left fragment was found during the 1893 excavation campaign, the main fragment in the 1895 campaign; the smaller fragment was first published in 1893, the two together in 1895, with a single inventory entry for both.

bibliography

    Orsi 1893 282 no. 17 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715 Orsi 1895 505 no. 226 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001711 Wessel 1989 184 no. 781 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000394
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
